body: This is so funny, how he keeps fucking it up, over and over. In the most absurd ways too.
i really hate the mc even if i know that that is how humans are
This mc is really fucked up.

@Aikkuma: That's not a defense ... the early colonists who massacred the natives were horrible bastards, as were those who used the Monroe Doctrine as an excuse to conquer western and central America. However, there is still a key difference. The Native Americans were helpless in front of early modern arms but they did attempt to fight back ... they were not pacifists. This guy, on the other hand, is killing people who have no idea what the concept of murder is. It takes a special kind of evil to understand that and still do it (I could excuse his initial actions because he did not know violence did not exist here and was frightened and shocked by a new society and culture).

I hope they rebel and kill him ... he's certainly not physically or technologically superior to any of them.
his reign would not be long for sure..
